effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. Causes the target to flinch. Can only be used on the user’s first turn after entering the field.
effect.the_teal_mask: Inflicts regular damage. Causes the target to flinch. Can only be used on the user’s first turn after entering the field.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts regular damage. Causes the target to flinch. Can only be used on the user’s first turn after entering the field.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Can only be used as the first move after the user enters battle. Causes the target to flinch.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Can only be used as the first move after the user enters battle. Causes the target to flinch.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Can only be used as the first move after the user enters battle. Causes the target to flinch.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: This attack hits first and makes the target flinch. It works only on the first turn each time the user enters battle.
